channel.title: How do you change skill's name - still need help
channel.description: [code]for example i want to change "farming" to "minigame" so when u see all skills it says minigame[/code]

item.title: How do you change skill's name - still need help
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

I don’t mean to grave dig or anything, but anyways…

Here is an awesome tutorial made by Lin: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367142.msg2781798.html#msg2781798
Try search engine next time

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change skill's name - still need help

item.title: How do you change skill's name - still need help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You have to change the skill icon in the client, as it is a sprite. For the interface it is server-sided, and the tab that opens up remaining XP is client-sided (I think).

Read full topic

item.title: How do you change skill's name - still need help

item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

You would have to replace the skills interface to change the icon. Then you could just open up your own sendQuest interface after that I guess.

item.title: How do you change skill's name - still need help

item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

pl0x15:

Correct me someone if I’m wrong, the icon changing is Client-Sided. And umm, the skill name may be in texthandler.java

i believe your correct, but i think th texthandler.java part is incorrect but i may be wrong, let me see if i can find and ill tell you which file to look
